actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A resolution relating to a survey of the shores of the State of South Carolina in the interest of beach erosion control, hurricane protection, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works to request the Secretary of the Army to direct the Chief of Engineers to make a survey of the shores of South Carolina in the interest of beach erosion control, hurricane protection, and related purposes.

titles.title: A resolution relating to a survey of the shores of the State of South Carolina in the interest of beach erosion control, hurricane protection, and for other purposes.
